com.netflix.spectator.spark

Class SidecarRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.AbstractRegistry
      • com.netflix.spectator.spark.SidecarRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.netflix.spectator.api.Registry, Iterable<com.netflix.spectator.api.Meter>

    public class SidecarRegistry
extends com.netflix.spectator.api.AbstractRegistry
    Registry that reports values to a sidecar process via an HTTP call.

      • start

        public void start(URL url,
                  long pollPeriod,
                  TimeUnit pollUnit)
        Start sending data to the sidecar.
        Parameters:
        url - Location of the sidecar endpoint.
        pollPeriod - How frequently to poll the data and send to the sidecar.
        pollUnit - Unit for the pollPeriod.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop sending data to the sidecar and shutdown the executor.
